name: Neuvillette
title: Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment
description: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

normal.1: With light flourishes, Neuvillette commands the tides to unleash a maximum of 3 attacks, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.

chargedLegal.1: While charging up, Neuvillette will gather the power of water, forming it into a Seal of Arbitration. In this state, Neuvillette can move and change facing, and also absorb any Sourcewater Droplets in a certain AoE.
chargedLegal.2: Every Droplet he absorbs will increase the formation speed of the Seal, and will heal Neuvillette.
chargedLegal.3: When the charging is stopped, if the Symbol has yet to be formed, then a Charged Attack will be unleashed. If it has been formed, then a Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment will be unleashed.

charged.1: Consumes a fixed amount of Stamina to attack opponents with a rupturing blast of water, dealing <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro>.

chargedJudgment.1: Unleashes surging torrents, dealing continuous <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> to all opponents in a straight-line area in front of him.
chargedJudgment.2: Equitable Judgment will not consume any Stamina and lasts 3s.
chargedJudgment.3: If Neuvillette's HP is above 50%, he will continuously lose HP while using this attack.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Hydro, Neuvillette plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Summons a Raging Waterfall that will deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> to opponents in front of Neuvillette based on his Max HP. After hitting an opponent, this skill will generate 3 Sourcewater Droplets near that opponent.
description.3: At certain intervals, when the Raging Waterfall descends, a Spiritbreath Thorn will descend that will pierce opponents, dealing Pneuma-aligned <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.
description.5: "The law can restrict all manner of crimes, but it cannot extirpate evil itself.

description.0: Unleashes waves that will deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> based on Neuvillette's Max HP. After a short interval, 2 waterfalls will descend and deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> in a somewhat smaller AoE, and will generate 6 Sourcewater Droplets within an area in front.
description.2: "The law is only established after its publication, and above that, the laws of nature have governed all species and eras since ancient times.

passive1.name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority

description.0: When a party member triggers a Vaporize, Frozen, Electro-Charged, Bloom, Hydro Swirl, or a Hydro Crystallize reaction on opponents, 1 stack of Past Draconic Glories will be granted to Neuvillette for 30s. Max 3 stacks. Past Draconic Glories causes Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment to deal 110%/125%/160% of its original DMG.
description.1: The stacks of Past Draconic Glories created by each kind of Elemental Reaction exist independently.

description.0: For each 1% of Neuvillette's current HP greater than 30% of Max HP, he will gain 0.6% <hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</hydro>. A maximum bonus of 30% can be obtained this way.
Increases underwater Sprint SPD for your own party members by 15%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: When Neuvillette takes the field, he will obtain 1 stack of Past Draconic Glories from the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority." You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."
description.1: Additionally, his interruption resistance will be increased while using the Charged Attack Empowerment: Legal Evaluation and the Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment.

description.0: The Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority" will be enhanced: Each stack of Past Draconic Glories will increase the CRIT DMG of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 14%. The maximum increase that can be achieved this way is 42%.
description.1: You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."

description.0: Increases the Level of Normal Attack: As Water Seeks Equilibrium by 3.
When Neuvillette is on the field and is healed, 1 Sourcewater Droplet will be generated. This effect can occur once every 4s.
Increases the Level of O Tides, I Have Returned by 3.

When using Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment, Neuvillette can absorb nearby Sourcewater Droplets in an AoE. Each absorbed Droplet will increase the duration of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 1s.
description.1: Additionally, when Equitable Judgment hits opponents, it will fire off 2 additional currents every 2s, each of which will deal 10% of Neuvillette's Max HP as <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>. DMG dealt this way will count as DMG dealt by Equitable Judgment.
